settings.title: People are talking.
settings.subtitle: Groundwork Coffee Press
settings.desc: Our mission is to source and share exceptional, organic coffee that inspires people to work hard, dream big, and impact the world.

settings.title: Daily Grind
settings.ref: Soil health & regenerative agriculture – the latest trend in third wave coffee?
settings.desc: In the wake of the climate crisis and declining profitability in coffee production, regenerative agriculture has emerged as a transformative solution.

settings.title: NyMag.com
settings.ref: What Ashley Benson Can’t Live Without
settings.desc: I love kitschy things in my house, so I had to get Bitches Brew because of the name. And it’s actually a really nice roast. It blends well in the drinks I make, and it’s not too acidic.

settings.title: Daily Coffee News
settings.ref: First Regenerative Organic Certified Coffee Hits US Market
settings.desc: A farm-focused, third-party social and environmental certification scheme called Regenerative Organic Certified has moved into the coffee industry.

settings.title: The Argonaut
settings.ref: Groundwork Coffee: Doing Good for People and the Planet
settings.desc: The B Corp Certificate is awarded to companies that agree to meet high standards of performance, accountability and transparency throughout their entire business model.

settings.title: BEVNET
settings.ref: Groundwork Coffee Receives B Corp Certification
settings.desc: Groundwork Coffee, one of the leading organic coffee roasters in the U.S., is proud to share that their mission-driven ways are now supported by the distinguished B Corp certification.

settings.title: BEVNET
settings.ref: Los Angeles-based Organic Coffee Shop, Groundwork Coffee Co., Highlights Mission-Forward Vision With Brand Refresh
settings.desc: The brand refresh captures the essence of Groundwork’s Southern California roots by representing the culture with updated designs and color palettes.

settings.title: Bartalks.net
settings.ref: Organic Groundwork Coffee Shop Lays Out Updated Mission
settings.desc: Although there are a lot of fairtrade coffee companies out there, the number of committed organic coffee companies is much smaller. The company website goes into quite a lot of detail about who they work with and why.

settings.title: Brewbound.com
settings.ref: Santa Monica Brew Works Collabs with Groundwork Coffee to Release Breakfast Brew Golden Mocha Porter
settings.desc: Santa Monica Brew Works announces the latest edition in its series of limited-release beers celebrating local businesses.

settings.title: Santa Monica Daily Press
settings.ref: Community Coffee Institution Groundwork Celebrates 30 Years of Purpose-driven Roasting
settings.desc: What started as a small family owned rare books store and coffee roastery tucked away on Rose Avenue, has now become a West Coast hallmark of sustainable and organic coffee.

settings.title: Patch.com
settings.ref: Venice's Groundwork Coffee Drops a Fresh Rebrand
settings.desc: Groundwork Coffee is celebrating 30 years of business in the community with a new design, website and remembering where it all started — at the original Venice shop.

settings.title: Westside Current
settings.ref: Groundwork Grows From Rose Ave in Venice to West Coast Hallmark
settings.desc: What started as a small family owned rare books store and coffee roastery tucked away on Rose Avenue, has now become a West Coast hallmark of sustainable and organic coffee.

settings.title: Santa Monica Daily Press
settings.ref: Santa Monica Brew Works Teamed up with Organic Coffee Roasters Groundwork Coffee Co.
settings.desc: The brewery teamed up with organic coffee roasters Groundwork Coffee Co. for their latest effort following partnerships with other local iconic places such as Bay Cities and Rip City Skates.

settings.title: Helena Coffee Processing & Export
settings.ref: 5 Places to Buy Wholesale Coffee in LA
settings.desc: In Venice, California, Groundwork Coffee roasters was established thirty years ago. Originally a modest roaster, they have grown to include cafes sprouting up all along the West Coast, a growing selection of cold brew coffees.
